department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the services of occupational health physicians for 125 hours per week to provide expert medical consultations/opinions and recommendations in relation to RCMP members’, fitness for duty and RCMP health benefits and services.
full_summary:
**Tender Notice for Occupational Health Services**
================================================================

**Notice Reference Number** : WS4130805320-Doc4320461220
**Amendment Number** : 5
**Publication Date** :  2023-11-23
**Tender Closing Date** : 2024-01-08, 14:00:00 (AST)
**Procurement Category** : SRV (Services)

**Notice Type** : Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method** : Competitive - Traditional
**Selection Criteria** : Lowest Cost-per-Point

**Contracting Authority**
------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the contracting authority for this tender.

**End-User Entity**
-------------------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is the end-user entity for this requirement.

**Summary of the Requirement**
-----------------------------

The RCMP requires the services of occupational health physicians to provide expert medical consultations and opinions in relation to RCMP members' fitness for duty and RCMP health benefits and services. The contract period will be from contract award up to one year, with an option to extend for four one-year periods.

**Security Requirements**
-------------------------

This requirement includes security requirements. An Indigenous Participation Plan (IPP) is also attached to this solicitation.

**Notice Details**
-----------------

* GSIN: None
* UNSPSC: 80100000, 85121600
* Trade Agreements: CKFTA, CCFTA, CFTA, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, CPTPP, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, CUFTA, CETA, WTO GPA, CPFTA
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Canada, Ottawa

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any inquiries or submissions, please contact:

Kaine, Joshua (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [joshua.kaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joshua.kaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: [Not provided]

**Disclaimer**
--------------

The contracting authority reserves the right to accept or reject any or all submissions received in response to this notice. This notice is not a commitment by the Crown to contract for the goods and services described. The Crown will consider all submissions in accordance with the Trade Agreements and other applicable laws. Submitted materials must be in compliance with the requirements specified in the notice.
